# an opening or small chamber at the base of a ceramic [[kiln]] where the fire is lit; firebox, fire hole, fire-tunnel, stoking chamber
types.html:
alandier m (plural alandiers)

  1. an opening or small chamber at the base of a ceramic kiln where the fire is lit; firebox, fire hole, fire-tunnel, stoking chamber
trans: an opening or small chamber at the base of a ceramic kiln where the fire is lit
firebox, fire hole, fire-tunnel, stoking chamber
